sqlQuery.name: Counts
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'helper' AS helper_id, organism_count, protein_count, group_count FROM ( select count(orthomcl_taxon_id) as organism_count from apidb.OrthomclTaxon where core_peripheral in ('C','P') ), ( select count(ogas.ortholog_group_aa_sequence_id) AS protein_count from APIDB.orthologgroupaasequence ogas , APIDB.orthologgroup og where ogas.ortholog_group_id = og.ortholog_group_id and og.core_peripheral_residual in ('P','R') ), ( select count(ortholog_group_id) AS group_count from APIDB.orthologgroup where core_peripheral_residual in ('P','R') )

sqlQuery.name: Taxons
sqlQuery.sql: select q.*, rownum as sort_index from ( select 'helper' AS helper_id, omt.orthomcl_taxon_id as taxon_id, nvl(omt.parent_id, omt.orthomcl_taxon_id) AS parent_id, omt.three_letter_abbrev as abbreviation, omt.is_species, omt.common_name, omt.name, cats.category from apidb.OrthomclTaxon omt, (select orthomcl_taxon_id, name, connect_by_root name as category from apidb.OrthomclTaxon start with name in ('Archaea', 'Bacteria', 'Alveolates', 'Amoebozoa', 'Euglenozoa', 'Fungi', 'Metazoa', 'Other Eukaryota', 'Viridiplantae') connect by parent_id = prior orthomcl_taxon_id ) cats where omt.orthomcl_taxon_id = cats.orthomcl_taxon_id(+) order by cats.category nulls first, is_species desc, name ) q

sqlQuery.name: DataSummary
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'helper' AS helper_id, ot.name, ot.three_letter_abbrev, od.resource_name, od.resource_url, od.resource_version, case ot.core_peripheral when 'C' then 'Core' when 'P' then 'Peripheral' else '' end as core_peripheral, CASE SUBSTR(ot.three_letter_abbrev,5,4) WHEN '-old' THEN 'no' ELSE 'most_recent' END as most_recent, t.ncbi_tax_id as ncbi_taxon_id, 'https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/Browser/wwwtax.cgi?id=' || t.ncbi_tax_id AS ncbi_taxon_url, stats.sequences, stats.clustered_sequences, stats.groups FROM apidb.OrthomclTaxon ot, apidb.OrthomclResource od, sres.Taxon t, (select orthomcl_taxon_id, count(*) sequences, count(distinct ortholog_group_id) groups, sum(case when ortholog_group_id is null then 0 else 1 end) clustered_sequences from ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes group by orthomcl_taxon_id) stats WHERE od.orthomcl_taxon_id(+) = ot.orthomcl_taxon_id AND ot.orthomcl_taxon_id = stats.orthomcl_taxon_id(+) AND ot.is_species != 0 AND ot.taxon_id = t.taxon_id(+) ORDER BY ot.name

sqlQuery.name: RootTaxons
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'helper' AS helper_id, t.* FROM ( SELECT 'OBAC' AS taxon_abbrev, '#9999CC' AS color FROM dual UNION SELECT 'FIRM' AS taxon_abbrev, '#33CC99' AS color FROM dual UNION SELECT 'PROT' AS taxon_abbrev, '#99CC66' AS color FROM dual UNION SELECT 'ARCH' AS taxon_abbrev, '#77CCDD' AS color FROM dual UNION SELECT 'OEUK' AS taxon_abbrev, '#CC9999' AS color FROM dual UNION SELECT 'VIRI' AS taxon_abbrev, '#CC9933' AS color FROM dual UNION SELECT 'EUGL' AS taxon_abbrev, '#CCCC66' AS color FROM dual UNION SELECT 'ALVE' AS taxon_abbrev, '#CC3399' AS color FROM dual UNION SELECT 'FUNG' AS taxon_abbrev, '#AA44DD' AS color FROM dual UNION SELECT 'META' AS taxon_abbrev, '#CC6666' AS color FROM dual UNION SELECT 'AMOE' AS taxon_abbrev, '#3399CC' AS color FROM dual ) t
